name: The Intruder
description: A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

review.author: mokhlesrahman
review.heading: Entertaining
review.reviewBody: Of course this was not supposed to be a masterpiece. Yes it's predictable but it had its moments. It's a silly fun movie which keeps you on your seat. I had a good time and 2 extra stars just for Dennis quaid. He gave a crazy fun performance which made me and other audience feel uncomfortable at certain times. Especially the shower scene in bathroom, that's just pure gold. It's so uncomfortable that you'll just laugh. Overall its a fun movie to watch with your friends in a weekend.

keywords: couple,napa valley,former owner,shower scene,hiding inside a house
